attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review:
I got this app because i heard that if you downloaded it and said Tom holland name 10
times he would appear in you bedroom and you be your boyfriend but that didn’t happen and am furious this app is 100% trash and I can’t believe the would trick someone like me it’s a cruel frickn world

attributes.title: This app is not what I expected
attributes.review: As a trump supporter I expected a good app but in reality this app is not good. I am trying to understand the faults of this app but in al honesty from me this app is horrible. I signed up to know trumps election plans and to get updates about trump. But now I’m considering whether I should follow trump or someone else

attributes.title: Didn’t feel comfortable
attributes.review: While using this app I did not feel that I was getting the same treatment as other users. It may be mental but I still feel that this is not okay and a persistent being racist to many people in the world is in acceptable.

attributes.title: This app is terrible
attributes.review: The moment I logged in the app crashed!! I tried getting back on it but it continuously crashes every time. As the president I expected something more advanced since you’re a billionaire. Guess even that has it’s disadvantages.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I have nothing to do with take down trumps all thing. It is truly a bad app. It’s spams with stuff that has no relation to his presidency and I would recommend staying far away from this app. Not to mention it was poorly designed and is difficult to use.

This is the worst app I’ve ever seen. I went to check out what our great dictator Cheeto was doing and turns out he’s not a cool dude. So get this, this giant Oompa Loompa is trying to take away our basic human rights and people are actually agreeing with him? So I had to leave a bad review because this is a big nono support.
attributes.userName: Gwennie with the eyes that sparkle

attributes.title: Garbage
attributes.review: This app took forever to download and once it did it ate up all my battery and I was only on it for a few minutes 😡 there also was no good or worthy content on the app making the app useless. I will be deleting it immediately

attributes.title: SCAM
attributes.review: I got this app with high hopes because Trump 2020, but a day after I got it some old dude came to my house BEGGING for me to use a trump shaped dildo on him since he knew I got the app. When I told him I don't have any shrimp he freaked out and tried to castrate me. Needless to say I deleted the app quickly. I'm never going back.

attributes.title: Wow
attributes.review: This app is continuously crashing on me and seriously is no good whatsoever I personally don’t support trump but wanted to see his plans for the election but seeing as the app is crashing and no longer working at all I’ve decided that I needed to rate it a 1, really wish I could rate it a zero

attributes.title: (Dump Trump)’s App!
attributes.review: As I opened the app, I was greeted by the most terrifying sight in the whole world; a racist, sexist, racist, unintelligent, and did i mention racist? face on the screen. I immediately closed the app, but I have had nightmares for days now and I’m loosing sleep! Do not download if you want to be able to sleep well at night.
